backend/main.mo: Defines the Product type and provides functions to add, query, filter, sort, and group products in a Map-based store.
backend/migration.mo: Clones the existing products map and inserts additional predefined products for migration to the new actor version.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking product image rendering requirements to the ProductCard component and associated test coverage.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten short summaries for all frontend files used in the project.
frontend/.env: Defines environment variables for the app name and slug used in branding.
frontend/index.css: Sets global Tailwind and OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes, including green and yellow brand colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting the page title, meta description, root element, and script loader for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app that fetches products, groups them by brand, and renders hero, brand sections, about section, and fallback UI states.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: Displays an about section with branding text, feature highlights, and informational content.
frontend/src/components/BrandSection.tsx: Renders a section header and product grid for a specific brand using ProductCard components.
frontend/src/components/BrandsSection.ts: Shows informational cards describing the Turtle Wax and 3M brands with icons and themed styling.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Reusable component displaying an alert-based empty or error state message.
frontend/src/components/HomeHero.tsx: Hero banner with headline text, description, and a large themed image with decorative gradients.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays a product card with image fallback, name, description, and tags using Tailwind styling.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders a footer showing branding info and a referral link with dynamic year and hostname.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Implements a responsive header with branding, smooth-scroll navigation, and a toggleable mobile menu.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Defines app-wide branding constants including name, slug, and tagline from environment variables.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Fetches product data from the backend actor using React Query once the actor is ready.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and OKLCH-based color theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, utilities, and theme extensions using app CSS variables.
project_state.json: Stores the projectâ€™s state, including version info, branding decisions, design notes, and a list of existing implemented features with requirement mappings.
